title: maNamAlaiyai
sahitya:
maNamAlaiyai shUDinEn en manam koNDa kAdalanai dinam kaNDu kaN kuLira


anupallavi

  guNa malai mIdE nirguNa ghana shAntamAik-kUDi nAn pADavE Adiya aruLukkE


caraNam    kAdalaik-kaDandOr kavarcciyuDan avanaik-kalandu kalandu kavi malarndu malarndu para nAdak-
kanavinilE Adip-paramporuLai nAnI enrariyAda mOna shuddhAnandat-tEnaip-parugi aduvAna sukhattinilE
